title: Short-Intensive Course on Customized Digital Design Tool Utilization for Beginners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Digital design tool training aimed at job seekers and beginner learners, focusing on immediately applicable skills in professional settings

learning_goals: Learners complete one A4-sized poster for a specified theme (e.g., local festival promotion) within 3 hours using basic Adobe Photoshop and Canva features (layer adjustment, text addition, image compositing).
Acquisition of skills to create simple web UI prototypes using Figma.

Learners identify nine common learning barriers (e.g., interface complexity, insufficient feature understanding, time management issues) when using digital design tools (Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator) and apply ≥3 of five proposed strategies to real-world scenarios, submitting design prototypes.

resources: Adobe Creative Cloud Educational Version License

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
